definitions.definition: A pair of straps crossing one's shoulders and extending down to one's trousers, where a clip or button arrangement allows them to affix to the trousers, ensuring that they will not fall off.
Small straps , attached to a suspender belt , that hold up a woman's stockings .

main_definition: ( US ) A pair of straps crossing one's shoulders and extending down to one's trousers, where a clip or button arrangement allows them to affix to the trousers, ensuring that they will not fall off.
secondary_definitions: ( British ) Small straps , attached to a suspender belt , that hold up a woman's stockings .
